#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Concept =

The project consists of several parts:

= Part 1: the library =

This main library *[python-banking]* is capable of establishing a conversation
to a bank server and retrieve account information from it.

= Part 2: the database =

A database stores all settings, logins, account info and the transaction list.

= Part 3: the cronjob =

A console script connects to the set up bank accounts using the above library and synchronizes the transaction database.

= Part 4: the notifier =

If set up, an email is sent whenever a new transaction was detected.

= Part 5: the web interface =

A Django web interface shows all transactions and provides some statistics etc.
